title: Intro! Opinions??

replies.body: Look, the intro is not bad at all, you just have to learn to put the sync well, meaning that the text moves synchronize with the song. The animation is well done with Cinema 4D, but you need to improve and learn more about the Affter Effects.
replies.body_tagged: Look, the intro is not bad at all, you just have to learn to put the sync well, meaning that the text moves synchronize with the song. The animation is well done with Cinema 4D, but you need to improve and learn more about the Affter Effects.

replies.body: Seems good but the song doesn't suit it that well - avoid that hardcore crap, it's earrape.
